articles.title: Ratings: ABC Rocks New Year's Eve as Always, Fox Slips With New Hosts - TVLine
articles.description: ABC rang in the new year with the best numbers of any broadcaster, as Dick Clark’s Rockin’ New Year’s Eve averaged 8.4 million total viewers and a 2.4 demo rating during primetime — exactly matching last year’s fast nationals. NBC’s three-hour programming blo…
